data.name: Furry Shades of Gay 2: A Shade Gayer - Supporter Art Pack
data.detailed_description:
This art pack contains all the artworks used in the game in their original resolution and some extras. Just go into the game's installation location, find the Art Pack folder, and enjoy!

And a very big thank you from all of us at Furlough Games! By purchasing this DLC you are helping us make more and better furry games!

data.short_description: All the artworks from the game, huge and uncompressed. Check out all the details and support the development of more furry games!
